title: Add state-level targets (SOI by state, state UI)
description:
State-level calibration targets for state-specific microsimulation.

Sources:
- SOI by state: https://www.irs.gov/statistics/soi-tax-stats-historic-table-2
- State unemployment insurance data
- State SNAP participation by state
- Census ACS state-level demographics

Enables state tax modeling and federalism analysis.

title: Add ONS population/household projections for UK
description:
UK equivalent of Census projections.

Sources:
- ONS National Population Projections
- ONS Household Projections  
- Regional breakdowns

Complements existing HMRC/DWP historical data with forward-looking targets.

title: Add CPS monthly employment/unemployment targets
description:
Monthly CPS data for labor force statistics. More granular than annual BLS aggregates.

Sources:
- BLS CPS tables: https://www.bls.gov/cps/tables.htm
- Employment status by age, sex, race
- Unemployment rates
- Labor force participation

Updates monthly - good for near-real-time calibration.

title: Implement calibration pipeline using targets DB
description:
Use the targets database to actually reweight microdata.

Pipeline:
1. Load microdata (CPS/FRS)
2. Query targets for year/jurisdiction
3. Run entropy balancing or raking
4. Output calibrated weights

This is the core value prop - connecting targets to microdata.
